mapper.select: SELECT member.id AS member_id, member.user_id, member.rank, member.create_time, user.NAME, `user`.sex, `user`.class_name, `user`.phone, status FROM member INNER JOIN `user` ON member.user_id = `user`.id WHERE member.association_id = #{associationId} and status = 0 ORDER BY member.create_time DESC
